item.description:
Terrance Hayes, National Book Award-winning poet, and Ani Gjika, an alumna of the BU Creative Writing Program, will be reading at BU THIS THURSDAY. Ani Gjika will be launching her first book!!! This is a FREE event. The reading will be followed by a book signing and dessert reception. I am really excited about this one.

For more info on Terrance Hayes: http://www.blueflowerarts.com/booking/terrance-hayes
item.name: Terrence Hayes and Ani Gjika read at BU
